comments:

org.eclipse.help.base:

java.lang.ClassFormatError: org/eclipse/core/resources/ant/IncrementalBuild

I think this is due to the compilation errors in the 8AM build.
Most likely addressed by proper compilation of the runtime Ant JAR...
